titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor, and Court of Aldermen, at Guild-Hall Chappel, upon the 5th of November, 1673 in commemoration of Englands deliverance from the Gun-powder treason / by John Scott, Minister of St. Thomas's in Southwark.
titleStmt.author: Scott, John, 1639-1695.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
